external_games.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster

name: Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster
summary: Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster is a point-and-click adventure video game that stars Tim Curry as Dr. Frankenstein, and has the player controlling a newly created Frankenstein monster. It used full motion video clips and 3D CGI graphics similar to Myst.
